architectural_notes: Admin routes are protected by AdminRouteGuard which requires adminSession.isUnlocked() to be true; login flow must call adminSession.unlock() to grant access.
known_issues: After admin login, enquiries/messages do not display due to 'no access'â€”admin session not unlocking for AdminRouteGuard.

existing_features.title: Ensure that a successful admin passkey login actually unlocks access for all guarded admin pages (including Enquiries and Messages) by persisting the unlocked session state and redirecting to the originally requested admin route.

Fix backend authorization initialization for admin-only data reads so that, after passkey unlock, admin data queries (enquiries/messages) can successfully call the backend without being blocked by missing access-control initialization.
Make React Query admin data screens reliably refresh after admin unlock so that enquiries and messages appear immediately after login without requiring a manual page refresh.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix admin login/session so AdminRouteGuard unlocks and admin can view enquiries and messages after login

projectName: Fix admin passkey login so admin can view enquiries and messages
